question: Which two countries celebrate "Dia de la Altagracia" festival?
explanation: People of Haiti and the Dominican Republic in the Hispaniola Islands of Greater Antilles Archipelago in the West Indies-Caribbean region celebrates Dia de la Altagracia festival on January 21 every year to celebrate the victory over the French in 1690 in honour of "Our Lady of Altagracia", the protector of the Dominican Republic.
